About Nacos

An easy-to-use platform for building cloud native applications

Released on Oct 19, 2023
ABOUT US Why Nacos
Easy
One-stop solution for dynamic service discovery. Configuration management and dynamic DNS service 20+ out-of-the-box features for service-centric architectures Light-weight production-ready console
ADAPTIVE
Seamlessly support kubernetes and spring cloud Easier to deploy and run on popular public cloud (for example AliCloud and AWS) Support multi-tenants and multi-environments
TIME_TESTED
Originated from time-tested internal products from Alibaba Group. Supports large-scale scenarios with millions of services Open-source product with enterprise-level SLA
VARIETY
Supports rate throttling, big promotion plans, and multi-region active-active architectures Supports a variety of relevant internet-based use cases directly or with slight extension Traffic scheduling & service governance
VIEW ON GITHUB Explore Our Features
Dynamic Configuration Service
Manage configurations in all environments in a centralized, externalized, and dynamic approach.
Service Discovery and Management
Key to service-centric (for example microservice or cloud-native) architectures.
Dynamic DNS Service
You can implement stateless services and achieve on-demand scaling effortlessly.
SELECTION OF SOME COMPANIES

Subscribe for more

By providing an easy-to-use service infrastructure such as dynamic service discovery,service configuration, service sharing and management and etc.
